title: Background Picture
content:
This indicator is used to display images from files in the chart window on background or over chart.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Common

NameDescription
Location Specifies the display location of the image.

Options:
  • Center
  • Top left
  • Top right
  • Bottom left
  • Bottom right
Scale Defines the scale value for the element.
Transparency Defines a value for the transparency component of an image.
Horizontal offset Sets the x-axis offset of the image in pixels.
Vertical offset Sets the y-axis offset of the image in pixels.
Show above chart Determines whether the visual elements are drawn above or below the price data on a chart. When enabled, it overlays the indicator's graphics over the price plot.

Location

NameDescription
Image Location Image files (*.bmp, *.gif, *.jpeg, *.jpg, *.png, *.tiff)
